attributes.action: not support or actively lobby for Tony Blair as president of European Council.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Green Party leader and MEP Caroline Lucas states it best:
"Can there be anyone outside of the government who really believes that the man who snubbed the EU over Iraq and joined with George W Bush to lead us into an illegal war is now the right person to become the EU's first Council President?" Tony Blair should not be rewarded for his part in the dissemination of lies leading up to the Iraq War (Re: WMDs) by being offered a role of international standing.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
